title: Communication Skills and Professional Readiness Enhancement Program for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous Learning Environments with Digital Devices and Continuous Feedback via Formative Assessments

learning_goals: Improve the ability to write reports and research papers required in science education settings with over 80% accuracy
Improve oral presentation and discussion skills by over 70% when collaborating with students and fellow teachers
Apply at least three science communication strategies reflecting local industry needs to lesson design
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
